title: Momentum - Change in KE for inelastic collision

content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the change in kinetic energy of the cart-box system between times <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="t equals t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta K equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta K equals, one half times m sub c, end sub, times, v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta K equals, one half, times, open parenthesis, m sub c, end sub, plus m sub B, close parenthesis, times v sub f, end sub, squared, minus one half times m sub c, end sub, times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta K equals, one half times m sub c, end sub, times, v sub 0, end sub, squared, minus one half times, open parenthesis, m sub c, end sub, plus m sub B, close parenthesis, times v sub f, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="delta K equals, one half, times, open parenthesis, m sub c, end sub, plus m sub B, close parenthesis, times v sub f, end sub, squared, minus one half times m sub c, end sub, times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
